title: Newsletters
text:
Subscribe to a periodic newsletter!



Newsletter sign-up: victorsothervector.substack.com









The newsletter is a free-to-view medium for me to share what I find interesting, so it’ll mostly center around machine learning (AI), education, and language/linguistics. Other things may leak through but it’ll be close to on brand.  For now, it’ll go through Substack but the actual material will be on this site. Eventually, newsletter emails will go out without Substack (but I gotta figure that out first).  I make no claims it will be on a ‘regular’ interval!  (But maybe bimonthly to monthly)





















Let’s Try That Again


Oh hey— it’s been a while.



newsletter









Apr 17, 2025


Victor Geislinger






No matching items

title: Coders: The Making of a New Tribe and the Remaking of the World
text:
Started: 2025-05-02T17:55:48Z
Ended: 2025-05-02T18:26:17Z
Total Time Read: 0hrs 30mins 29secs



Code
%run _help_reading.py
import pandas as pd

df = pd.read_csv(
  'https://github.com/MrGeislinger/victorsothervector/raw/main/'
  'data/reading/all_reading-clean.csv'
)

book_name = """Coders: The Making of a New Tribe and the Remaking of the World"""
one_title = one_title_data(df, book_name)
one_title_summary = get_summary_by_day(one_title)
generate_plot(one_title_summary, book_name);








Figure 1: Reading done for Coders: The Making of a New Tribe and the Remaking of the World
